# Network Settings Schema

- [<add> Element for authenticationModules (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/add-element-for-authenticationmodules-network-settings.md): The <add> network settings element for connectionManagement adds an IP address or DNS name to the connection management list in the .NET Framework.
- [<add> Element for bypasslist (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/add-element-for-bypasslist-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <add> Element for bypasslist (Network Settings)
- [<add> Element for connectionManagement (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/add-element-for-connectionmanagement-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <add> Element for connectionManagement (Network Settings)
- [<add> Element for schemeSettings (Uri Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/add-element-for-schemesettings-uri-settings.md): Learn more about: <add> Element for schemeSettings (Uri Settings)
- [<add> Element for webRequestModules (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/add-element-for-webrequestmodules-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <add> Element for webRequestModules (Network Settings)
- [<authenticationModules> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/authenticationmodules-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <authenticationModules> Element (Network Settings)
- [<bypasslist> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/bypasslist-element-network-settings.md): The <bypasslist> network settings element provides a set of regular expressions that describe addresses that do not use a proxy in the .NET Framework.
- [<clear> Element for authenticationModules (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/clear-element-for-authenticationmodules-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <clear> Element for authenticationModules (Network Settings)
- [<clear> Element for bypasslist (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/clear-element-for-bypasslist-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <clear> Element for bypasslist (Network Settings)
- [<clear> Element for connectionManagement (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/clear-element-for-connectionmanagement-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <clear> Element for connectionManagement (Network Settings)
- [<clear> Element for schemeSettings (Uri Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/clear-element-for-schemesettings-uri-settings.md): Learn more about: <clear> Element for schemeSettings (Uri Settings)
- [<clear> Element for webRequestModules (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/clear-element-for-webrequestmodules-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <clear> Element for webRequestModules (Network Settings)
- [<connectionManagement> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/connectionmanagement-element-network-settings.md): The <connectionManagement> network settings element specifies the maximum number of connections to a network host in the .NET Framework.
- [<defaultFtpCachePolicy> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/defaultftpcachepolicy-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <defaultFtpCachePolicy> Element (Network Settings)
- [<defaultHttpCachePolicy> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/defaulthttpcachepolicy-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <defaultHttpCachePolicy> Element (Network Settings)
- [<defaultProxy> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/defaultproxy-element-network-settings.md): The <defaultProxy> network settings element configures the Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) proxy server in .NET Framework.
- [<httpListener> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/httplistener-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <httpListener> Element (Network Settings)
- [<httpWebRequest> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/httpwebrequest-element-network-settings.md): The <httpWebRequest> network settings element customizes Web request parameters in the .NET Framework.
- [<idn> Element (Uri Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/idn-element-uri-settings.md): Learn more about: <idn> Element (Uri Settings)
- [Network Settings Schema](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/index.md): Learn about the schema for the network settings that specify how the .NET Framework connects to the Internet and handles URIs.
- [<ipv6> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/ipv6-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <ipv6> Element (Network Settings)
- [<iriParsing> Element (Uri Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/iriparsing-element-uri-settings.md): Learn more about: <iriParsing> Element (Uri Settings)
- [<mailSettings> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md): The <mailSettings> network settings element configures the mail sending options in the .NET Framework.
- [<module> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/module-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <module> Element (Network Settings)
- [<network> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/network-element-network-settings.md): The <network> network settings element configures the network options for an external SMTP server options in the .NET Framework.
- [<performanceCounters> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/performancecounter-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <performanceCounters> Element (Network Settings)
- [<proxy> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/proxy-element-network-settings.md): The <proxy> network settings element defines the proxy server options in the .NET Framework. This article includes an example.
- [<remove> Element for authenticationModules (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/remove-element-for-authenticationmodules-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <remove> Element for authenticationModules (Network Settings)
- [<remove> Element for bypasslist (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/remove-element-for-bypasslist-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <remove> Element for bypasslist (Network Settings)
- [<remove> Element for connectionManagement (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/remove-element-for-connectionmanagement-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <remove> Element for connectionManagement (Network Settings)
- [<remove> Element for schemeSettings (Uri Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/remove-element-for-schemesettings-uri-settings.md): Learn more about: <remove> Element for schemeSettings (Uri Settings)
- [<remove> Element for webRequestModules (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/remove-element-for-webrequestmodules-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <remove> Element for webRequestModules (Network Settings)
- [<requestCaching> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <requestCaching> Element (Network Settings)
- [<schemeSettings> Element (Uri Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/schemesettings-element-uri-settings.md): Learn more about: <schemeSettings> Element (Uri Settings)
- [<servicePointManager> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/servicepointmanager-element-network-settings.md): The <servicePointManager> network settings element configures connections to network resources options in the .NET Framework.
- [<settings> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/settings-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <settings> Element (Network Settings)
- [<smtp> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md): The <smtp> network settings element configures the delivery format, delivery method, and from address for sending emails options in the .NET Framework.
- [<socket> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/socket-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <socket> Element (Network Settings)
- [<specifiedPickupDirectory> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/specifiedpickupdirectory-element-network-settings.md): The <specifiedPickupDirectory> network settings element configures the local directory for an SMTP server options in the .NET Framework.
- [<system.Net> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/system-net-element-network-settings.md): The <system.Net> network settings element contains settings that specify how the .NET Framework connects to the network options in the .NET Framework.
- [<uri> Element (Uri Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/uri-element-uri-settings.md): Learn more about: <uri> Element (Uri Settings)
- [<webProxyScript> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/webproxyscript-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <webProxyScript> Element (Network Settings)
- [<webRequestModules> Element (Network Settings)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/webrequestmodules-element-network-settings.md): Learn more about: <webRequestModules> Element (Network Settings)
